title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2817.1 - Technical service and assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2817.1 - Technical service and assistance

State Regulations
(a) The division will render to rural
preservation companies such technical services and assistance as it may possess
or as may be available to, is to enable such companies to comply with the
intent and provision of this Chapter and article XVII of the Private Housing

Finance Law. (b) The division may, subject to the availability of funds appropriated for the purposes of the rural
preservation companies program, contract with municipal and other public
agencies and with private persons, firms and corporations including rural
preservation companies, for the provision of such technical services and
assistance. (c) Assistance may
include the provision of technical services in: (1)
preparation and submissions of contract
proposals under this Chapter or any other program of governmental
assistance; (2)
preparation and
submission of required reports; (3)
internal organization and management of companies; (4)
the area of technology transfer between
rural preservation companies as selected by the division; and
(5)
other technical advice or assistance
relating to the performance or rendition of rural preservation companies
activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2817.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
